combobox.name: cbBuffPrismOn
combobox.Width:
100 20 The Raid Friend to cast the 3-proc "Prismatic" buff upon.
Text
if (${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[BuffPrism](exists)}) { This:AddItem[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[BuffPrism]}] This.ItemByText[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[BuffPrism]}]:Select } else { This:AddItem["No one"] This.ItemByText["No one"]:Select }
LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}]:AddSetting[BuffPrism,${This.SelectedItem.Text}] Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:Save_Settings
Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:RefreshList[${This.FullName},BuffPrism,1,1,1]
